name: FAN GAME of Pac-Man, Flappy Bird and Other ...
name_original: FAN GAME of Pac-Man, Flappy Bird and Other ...
description:
<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">À peine 1.0: </font></foshortly nt>

Shortly 1.0 :

- A menu with choice of 3 difficulty modes.

- An introductory scene.

- When you touch the upper or lower edge, the transition is less raw.

FAN GAME de Pac-Man, Flappy Bird et autres

Par Sylvain Espiasse

Crédit : 

Invasion de l'espace visuel:

invaders from space space by http://fontvir.us

Musique :

Menu : menu loop by aflixion (https://aflixion.newgrounds.com)

In game :

Intro : opening 5 by Fantasy Musica (https://soundcloud.com/fantasymusica/)

2nd : opening theme by nene (https://opengameart.org/users/nene)

3ème : opening 3 by Fantasy Musica (https://soundcloud.com/fantasymusica/)

credit :

Casual warrior : credits by orcabeatz (https://orcabeatz.newgrounds.com)

Super warrior : -Credits [DK]- by cosmos8942 (https://cosmos8942.newgrounds.com)

Legend : SMB2 Credits Theme by krykos (https://krykos.newgrounds.com)

SFX :

Trou noir : Space ambient by osmic (https://opengameart.org/users/osmic)

Explosion : 8-bit Platformer SFX commissioned by Mark McCorkle for OpenGameArt.org (https://opengameart.org)

Apparition space invader/destruction & collision statue de la liberté : SFX_Jump by Jesús Lastra (https://opengameart.org/users/jalastram)

Vaisseaux spatiaux: ( http://www.sa-matra.net/sounds/starwars/ ) et ( https://www.soundboard.com/sb/starwarsfx )

Autres effets: Sound Pack RPG par artisticdude ( https://opengameart.org/users/artisticdude )
